markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Psychic Colors Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2418)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This orange liquid lets you visibly detect the psychic energies that enable telekinesis and telepathy. For the next minute, you can sense if a creature you can see is using a telepathic or telekinetic ability, such as the [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) monster ability, spells like [_telekinetic projectile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) or [_telepathic bond_](/Spells.aspx?ID=335), or similar abilities. You also can sense if an object or creature you can see is being manipulated or contacted by such an ability. Both the user and the target of the ability are outlined in faint shimmers of matching color.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Psychic Colors Elixir
